snippet.title: Castlevania ReVamped - Fan Game Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
VERSION 1.1.1 IS OUT NOW - SEE LINKS BELOW

Check us out on X (Twitter) as @Lv4GAMES

A game I've put a lot of passion into, I present a re-working of the classicvania & metroidvania formula based on Castlevania on the NES! For Windows and Linux. Download below!
-------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.1.1 (LATEST, RECOMMENDED DOWNLOAD)
Windows:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qG6qBh2tegcyYNjoCzEDFaBekvWt3bLB/view?usp=sharing
Linux:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1uSQCzwVpZg0ItOnfdvL8-xZTtire7aqB/view?usp=drive_link
-------------------------------------------------------
OPEN-SOURCE VERSION
https://github.com/LSDonkeyKong/Castlevania-ReVamped-Open-Source-Edition
-------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.1 (OUTDATED)
Windows:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YU_33kG2xShrPknpI0GsxjX3g52oN3Hh/view?usp=sharing
Linux:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1oH3lodPnZEH86maA_mc8YKthxNV3FzZq/view?usp=sharing

Version 1.0 (OUTDATED)
Windows:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ug9O_dELbue_MrLYDNVOgxO8gOxEtLyZ/view?usp=sharing
Linux:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1wqv8XXud5q6qzdC2ykpots0YWN8u-FrM/view?usp=sharing

Discord Server for Castlevania ReVamped:
https://discord.gg/gRqkXbCeDA
